name: Blackened Chicken with Cajun Seasoning
description: A Cajun favourite made easy at home - with just 3 ingredients!

ingredients.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning or Louisiana Wing Seasoning

preparation: Preheat a frying pan to medium-high heat.
Brush butter on both sides of chicken. Coat or rub buttered chicken with Cajun Fries Seasoning.
Sear both sides of chicken for 2 minutes. Place pan in preheated oven for 6 minutes.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup cooked grains and 2 cups leafy greens with a squeeze of lemon juice.
